title: T206 Lot For Sale (4 HOF) 16 Different......$450
author: iggyman

posts.post_title: T206 Lot For Sale (4 HOF) 16 Different......$450
posts.post_content:
I have the following T206 Lot for sale.  Sixteen different cards, including four hall of famers and the pesky Lundgren Cubs variation (all with Piedmont backs). Price for the lot (including shipping) is $450 (paypal, check, or money order). Email address = [url]agonzdude@yahoo.com[/url] (this is not my paypal address...)

The Lundgren has a nice front with no creases but some paper loss on the backside.  The Waddell is SGC graded (fantastic eye appeal for the grade with no creases, but has two pinholes in the upper border).

Lovely Day...
I also have a T206 Mathewson (white cap) for $200.  Graded SGC A with solid eye appeal.  It has a slight crease towards the bottom and is slightly trimmed (bottom border).
Wow what a great lot of cards!  Thanks for posting them and good luck on your sale!

posts.post_title: Sorry to hi-jack the thread, but
posts.post_content: if someone buys this lot, and is not interested in the Lundgren (yeah, right, I know), please let me know. I am trying to get my hands on two of them to replace Lundgrens with stamps on the back, and finding them is getting harder and harder. Thanks.
